```{r}
#| label: normalize-force

setpointAFM <- AFM_protein |>
  slice(4800:5000)

zero_point <- mean(setpointAFM$force_r)
zero_point
AFM_b <- AFM_protein|>
  mutate(force_r = force_r - zero_point)|>
  mutate(force_f = force_f - zero_point)|>
  mutate(rownum = row_number(retraction))


AFM_normal <- AFM_protein|>
  mutate(force_r = force_r - zero_point)|>
  mutate(force_f = force_f - zero_point)|>
  mutate(extension = (extension + 4823.295)- (force_r/52.02284))|>
  mutate(retraction = ((retraction + 4823.295) - (force_r/52.02284)))|>
  mutate(rownum = row_number(extension))


ggplot(AFM_normal)+
  geom_line(aes(x = retraction, y = force_r))+
  geom_line(aes(x = extension, y = force_f), color = "red") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "orange")#+
  #geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = 173.3734, color = "blue")
```

```{r}
#| label: find-start-extension

protein_AFM_total <- AFM_normal

max_force <- max(protein_AFM_total$force_f)

protein_max <- protein_AFM_total |>
  filter(force_f == max_force)

Protein <- protein_AFM_total|>
  filter(extension > 120 & extension <= 256) #|>
  #filter(!extension > 140 | !extension <= 188)
  #filter(!extension > 140 | !extension <= 211) 
  #filter(!extension > 140 | !extension <= 236)

protein_max

colss <- c("blue", "red")
exten <- c("extension", "retraction")

ggplot(Protein)+
  #scale_x_reverse()+
  geom_line(aes(x = retraction, y = force_r, color = "red"))+
  geom_line(aes(x = extension, y = force_f, color = "blue"))+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_color_manual(name = "", labels = exten, values = colss)+
  labs(
    title = "Dextran force curve",
    x = "distance (nm)",
    y = "force (pN)",
    )#+
  #geom_smooth(aes(x = retraction_nm, y = force_r), se = FALSE, method = "gam", color = "black")

write.csv(Protein, "/home/guest/AFM_Dextran/data1/Protein_full.csv", row.names=FALSE)
```
